subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Orica Green-Edge won the Giro d’Italia’s opening team time trial on Saturday for the second year in a row, with Simon Gerrans taking the overall leader’s pink jersey.
snippet: Orica Green-Edge won the Giro d’Italia’s opening team time trial on Saturday for the second year in a row, with Simon Gerrans taking the overall leader’s pink jersey.
